thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Diana Containerships Announces Sale Of Two Post-Panamax Container Vessels For $22.0 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diana Containerships Announces Sale Of Two Post-Panamax Container Vessels For $22.0 Mln
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Diana Containerships Inc:
* PRESS RELEASE - DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC. ANNOUNCES THE SALE OF TWO POST-PANAMAX CONTAINER VESSELS
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - DEAL FOR US$22.0 MILLION * DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - ‍COMPANY EXPECTS VESSELS TO BE DELIVERED TO BUYER AT LATEST BY MARCH 30, 2018​
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - TO SELL M/V MARCH AND M/V GREAT​ FOR ‍AGGREGATE PRICE OF $22.0 MILLION TO AN UNAFFILIATED THIRD PARTY
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - ‍UPON COMPLETION OF AFOREMENTIONED SALE, DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC.‘S FLEET WILL CONSIST OF 9 CONTAINER VESSELS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
